import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:navigation/page_accueil.dart';
void main(){
  runApp(MyApp());
}
class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  const MyApp({Key? key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      title: 'navbar',
      theme: ThemeData(
        primarySwatch: Colors.blue
      ),
      home: HomePage(),

    );
  }
}
class HomePage extends StatefulWidget {
  const HomePage({Key? key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  State<HomePage> createState() => _HomePageState();
}

class _HomePageState extends State<HomePage> {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('Accueil'),
        backgroundColor: Colors.blue,
        centerTitle: true,
      ),
      drawer: NavigationDrawer(),
    );
  }
}
class NavigationDrawer extends StatelessWidget {
  const NavigationDrawer({Key? key}) : super(key: key);

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Drawer(
      child: SingleChildScrollView(
        child: Column(
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.stretch,
          children: [
            buildHeader(context),
            buildMenuItems(context),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );

  }

  Widget buildHeader(BuildContext context) {
    return Material(
      child: InkWell(
        onTap: () {},
        child: Container(
          color: Colors.purple,
          child: Column(
              children:[
                CircleAvatar(
                  radius: 52,
                  backgroundImage: NetworkImage('data:image/jpeg;base64,'),
                ),
                SizedBox(height: 5),
                Text(
                  'Thierno Souleymane bah',
                  style: TextStyle(
                      fontSize: 20,
                      color: Colors.white70
                  ),
                ),
                SizedBox(height: 5),
                Text(
                  'Thierno@gmail.com',
                  style: TextStyle(
                      fontSize: 16,
                      color: Colors.white70

                  ),
                ),
              ]
          ),
          //padding: EdgeInsets.only(top: MediaQuery.of(context).padding.top),
        ),
      ),
    );
  }

  Widget buildMenuItems(BuildContext context) {

    return Container(
      //padding: EdgeInsets.only(24),
      child: Wrap(
        runSpacing: 3,
        children: [
          ListTile(
            leading: Icon(
                Icons.home_outlined
            ),
            title: Text('Accueil'),
            onTap: () {
              //Navigator.of(context).pushReplacement(MaterialPageRoute(builder: context)=>PageAccueil())
              Navigator.pushReplacement(context,MaterialPageRoute(builder: (BuildContext)=>PageAccueil()));
            },
          ),
          ListTile(
            leading: Icon(
                Icons.favorite_outline
            ),
            title: Text('favoris'),
            onTap: () {},
          ),
          ListTile(
            leading: Icon(
                Icons.workspaces_outline
            ),
            title: Text('workflow'),
            onTap: () {},
          ),
          Divider(color: Colors.black54,),
          ListTile(
            leading: Icon(
                Icons.update
            ),
            title: Text('Mis a jours'),
            onTap: () {},
          ),
          ListTile(
            leading: Icon(
                Icons.account_tree_outlined
            ),
            title: Text('plugins'),
            onTap: () {},
          )
        ],
      ),
    );
  }

}
